title: WhatWas?
description: WhatWas is note taking app that allows users to save and organize their content on every device. Built with React, styled-components, Firebase, and Firestore.

title: Arena
description: A battle royale game built with VanillaJS, HTML Canvas, Socket.IO, and NodeJS.

title: trace-vitals
description: trace-vitals is a small script that traces the web-vitals and sends the reports to the given endpoint.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: A single player tic-tac-toe game built with VanillaJS and implemented Minimax algorithm.
